title: Israeli military chief to resign as tensions rise between Netanyahu, army brass
author: Shira Rubin, Gerry Shih
excerpt: Breaking news, live coverage, investigations, analysis, video, photos and opinions from The Washington Post. Subscribe for the latest on U.S. and international news, politics, business, technology, climate change, health and wellness, sports, science, weather, lifestyle and more.
